title: Accurate player marker on map
description: Place the player marker at the precise chunk-relative position on the map instead of always centering it.

title: Gate completion rewards and cleanup
description: When all waves are defeated, close/despawn the gate, spawn multiple loot rolls and gold stacks near the portal with biome-scaled weights (no rarity guarantee), and keep completion only for the current run (no save/load persistence).

title: Prevent looting when inventory is full
description: Block picking up ground loot when inventory has no free slots. Show a brief message/indicator so players know inventory is full; leave items on the ground.

title: Pause menu: add Return to Main Menu entry
description: Update escape/pause menu to include a 'Return to Main Menu' option above Exit that pops to the main menu scene cleanly (teardown world safely).

title: Add trash dropzone to destroy inventory items
description: Add a trash icon drop target in the inventory grid; dragging an item onto it removes the item permanently (with a hover highlight). Keep behavior consistent with drag gestures used for reorder/equip.

title: Plan save data model (player + world)
description:
Current behavior:
- main.lua saves a single `world_state.json` on `love.quit` when the world scene is active; load runs at startup if the file parses. Normalization only rebuilds chunk descriptors/props and clears runtime spawn tables.
- Persisted fields are limited to world seed/chunk config/start biome data, minimap visibility/zoom, visitedChunks, and generatedChunks (biome, transition, descriptors, props, defeatedFoes, lootedStructures). Player state (position, stats, health/mana, XP, potions, skills), inventory/equipment, ground loot, and timers are not saved, so reloads spawn a fresh character into a partially persisted world.

Plan for save data model:
- Add a schema version and slot metadata to the save payload so future migrations can validate data.
- Player payload: position, baseStats, health/mana current+max, combat/range, movement (speed/modifiers), experience (level/currentXP/unallocated points), potion counts + cooldownRemaining, skills (equipped slots plus allocations/availablePoints), inventory (full item rolls including affixes/stats/sprite/source/gold), and equipment slot assignments.
- World payload: chunk config (chunkSize/activeRadius/worldSeed/start biome flags), startBiomeCenter/radius/forceStartBiome, spawnSafeZone, visitedChunks, generatedChunks including zone names, transition data, props, defeatedFoes, and lootedStructures, plus minimap state (visible/zoom). Preserve chunk seeds/zone seeds when present to avoid renaming on reload.
- Runtime entities: capture ground loot (item/potion/gold with positions and despawn timers) so drops persist across sessions; ignore ephemeral render/physics state that can be recomputed.

Integration hooks:
- Extend WorldScene:serializeState to emit the player/world payload and wire a loader path that hydrates Player.new with saved components before applying stats/equipment.
- Validate decoded saves and provide safe fallbacks so corrupt files or missing fields do not crash load.
- Coordinate with save slot UI, autosave policy, corruption handling, and main menu load wiring so serialization feeds those features.

title: Spawn hell gates per biome via chunk generation
description: Extend spawn resolver/chunk descriptors to place 1-3 gates per biome/zone with deterministic seeds, ensuring no overlap with props/structures and safe zone avoidance.

title: Gate activation via player click
description: Add interaction system so clicking a dormant gate claims the click, transitions to active/open, and seeds wave timers while respecting UI click consumption patterns.

title: Minimap toggle and zoom hotkeys
description: Add minimap toggle and keyboard zoom hotkeys (configurable bindings) so players without scroll wheels can control map zoom.

title: Multi-slot save/load UI
description: Add a slots list to main menu and pause menu: list existing saves with metadata, allow creating/overwriting slots, selecting a slot to load, and show errors gracefully. Keep default slot behavior as fallback.

title: Autosave policy
description: Define autosave behavior (timed/zone-based), choose slot strategy, and integrate with save pipeline without disrupting manual slots.

title: Add inventory items in insertion order
description: Newly looted items should append to the next empty slot so inventory reads in pickup order instead of reverse/inverted order.

title: Persist player state in save files
description: Implement save/load coverage for the player entity so a session resumes with the same character instead of defaults. Capture position, movement modifiers, baseStats, health/mana values, combat range/timers, experience (level/currentXP/unallocated points), potion counts and cooldownRemaining, skills (equipped slots and allocations/availablePoints), inventory items with full stat rolls/sprite/source plus gold, and equipment slot assignments. Add a loader path that rebuilds Player.new from persisted data before systems run, reapplies stats/equipment, and tolerates missing fields with sane defaults.

title: Persist world and chunk state for saves
description: Extend serialization beyond chunk metadata to restore the world consistently. Persist chunk manager config/start biome flags, startBiomeCenter/radius, spawnSafeZone, visitedChunks, generatedChunks (including zoneName/zoneSeed/transition data, props, defeatedFoes, lootedStructures), and minimap state. Capture ground loot entities (items/potions/gold with positions, sources, and despawn timers) so drops survive reloads. Add load-time hydration that seeds ChunkManager with preserved seeds/zones, restores defeated/looted state before activation, and ignores transient physics/render data that systems recompute each frame.

title: Map zoom with scroll wheel
description: Allow zooming the map view in/out via mouse scroll wheel with sensible limits and smooth scaling.

title: Save/load system
description: Implement game save/load capability including serialization of player progress, world state, and file management.

title: Hell gate portal encounters
description: Add 'gate of hell' portal encounters that spawn multi-wave biome foes, visual portal, activation interaction, loot rewards, and persistence across chunks.

title: Handle corrupt saves gracefully
description: Detect corrupt/unreadable saves and fail gracefully with messaging and fallback to another slot or new game; avoid crashes.

title: Main menu scene integrated with ECS
description: Add a main menu scene that fits the ECS/scene manager flow: entry point before gameplay, transitions cleanly into the existing world start.

title: Retro Diablo2D title art for main menu
description: Create/draw a retro pixel-art Diablo2D main title for the menu (placeholder art acceptable now), sized/styled to sit atop the menu.

title: Main menu input polish
description: Add keyboard navigation/focus handling and confirm/exit prompts for the main menu; include a 'Return to game' option when menu is reused as pause.

title: Wave spawning system for gates
description: Implement gate-controlled wave scheduler (2-10 waves, 5-10s cadence) that spawns 3-7 biome-appropriate foes per wave around the portal without overlapping existing entities, and tracks live foes to advance/complete.

title: Main menu options hookup
description: Menu entries: New Game (behaves like current launch flow), Load (stub for now), Options (route to existing options menu), Exit (quits). Ensure input/scene transitions work.

title: Hide cramped biome labels on fogged map
description: When a biome area isn't sufficiently revealed, skip rendering its name to avoid layout overlap until enough of that biome is discovered.

title: Main menu button hover highlights
description: Update main menu buttons to show the same highlight state on mouse hover as when selected via keyboard navigation.

title: Portal visuals, counter, and spawn VFX
description: Render a red glowing portal entity with idle animation, display remaining-wave counter above it, and add red lighting/flash effects when waves spawn (including minimap/world rendering updates).

title: Design hell gate components and persistence
description: Define portal entity/component shape, gate state machine (dormant/active/closed), timers and wave bookkeeping. Keep state in-memory per run (no save/load coupling) but ensure chunk activation respects current state while active.

title: Integrate save/load entry points
description: Wire save/load triggers into game flow (start screen or pause), initialize world from save data, and fall back to new run when absent.

title: Map screen improvements
description: Epic for map UI/UX: zoom/pan controls, accurate player marker positioning, gated biome labels on undiscovered areas, and biome name under minimap.

title: Show current biome under minimap
description: Display the name of the current biome directly beneath the minimap so players always know their location context.

title: Add save slots to escape menu
description: Extend escape menu with a Save entry leading to five slots; allow saving into any slot, showing overwrite confirmation if needed.

title: Rework main menu title fire effect
Drag-and-drop inventory reordering and equip
description: Allow dragging items between inventory slots to reorder, and dragging onto equipment slots to equip (respect slot compatibility). Show placement highlight, allow swap with occupied slot, and persist new order. Cancelling drag should return item to original slot.

title: Tests and debug hooks for hell gates
description: Add busted coverage for gate state machine/wave spawning, spawn radius separation helper, loot weighting, and optionally a debug spawn shortcut for deterministic test seeds.

title: Fix main menu fire effect visuals
description: Current main menu fire backdrop looks yellow and particles unchanged; adjust shader/particles to look like pixelated fire.

title: Inventory management improvements
description: Epic to track inventory usability changes: insertion-order placement, drag-and-drop reorder/equip, trash dropzone, and blocking pickup when full.

title: Main menu overhaul
description: Epic to add a proper main menu integrated with ECS/scenes, include retro Diablo2D title art, and hook up menu options (new, load placeholder, options, exit).

title: Enlarge damage numbers for clarity
description: Increase floating combat damage number size for better readability.

title: Show XP gain as floating numbers matching XP bar color
description: Display XP gain popups in-world using the XP bar color so gains are visible when earned.

title: Map UI smoke tests
description: Add smoke/regression tests for map zoom/pan, marker positioning, and biome label visibility rules.

title: Main menu title polish with animated glow
description: Rework the main menu title/banner styling and add subtle animated particle/glow effects around the title for extra flair.

title: Inventory drag/drop/trash specs
description: Add test coverage for inventory insertion order, drag/drop reordering, equip via drag, and trash dropzone once implemented.

title: Keyboard pan for map
description: Support panning the map using arrow keys; hold to scroll continuously and respect zoom level.

title: Save file IO and slot management
description: Implement file read/write for saves using Love filesystem, manage save slots/metadata, and handle version mismatches gracefully.

title: Wire load into main menu
description: Hook the Load option in the main menu to the save system, listing slots and loading selected data; initial implementation depends on main menu and save pipeline.

title: Save/restore system
description: Epic to design and implement save/load: plan data model covering player entity and world, add save UI with slots in escape menu, and hook load into main menu. Blocked on main menu epic.

title: Define save data schema and serialization helpers
description: Design the data captured in saves (player stats, inventory, equipment, world seed/chunk state) and implement serializer/deserializer utilities with versioning support.
